page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
page.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about our coffee and service

ordering.q1: How do I place an order?
ordering.a1: Select coffee, add to cart and checkout. It takes less than 2 minutes.
ordering.q2: Can I change my order after placing it?
ordering.a2: Yes, contact us within 1 hour of ordering.
ordering.a3: There's no minimum. Order from 1 bag.

delivery_faq.a1: Via Nova Poshta 1-3 days. Orders before 14:00 ship same day.
delivery_faq.a2: Currently we only ship within Ukraine.
delivery_faq.a3: Free from 500₴. Below that — carrier rates.

payment_faq.a1: Card online, Apple Pay, Google Pay, cash on delivery.
payment_faq.q2: Is payment on the site secure?
payment_faq.a2: Yes, we use secure connection and certified payment systems.

products_faq.q1: How long does coffee stay fresh?
products_faq.a1: We recommend drinking within 4-6 weeks after roasting.
products_faq.q2: What's the difference between light and dark roast?
products_faq.a2: Light — more acidity, fruity notes. Dark — bitterness, chocolate tones.
products_faq.a3: Yes, you can choose grind for your brewing method.

subscription_faq.a1: You choose coffee, frequency and volume. We deliver automatically with 10% off.
subscription_faq.q3: How do I change coffee in my subscription?

returns_faq.q1: How do I return an item?
returns_faq.a1: Contact us within 14 days. We'll arrange the return.
returns_faq.q2: Will you refund an opened bag?
returns_faq.a2: If you didn't like the coffee — yes. We value your trust.

contact.title: Didn't find an answer?
contact.text: Write to us and we'll reply within an hour.
